summary: The small town of Flåklypa is experiencing great lack of snow, which is why the inventor Reodor Felgen is asked to create a snow machine. However, things does not go as planned.
cast: Kari Ann Grønsund|Trond Høvik|Trond Brænne|Kåre Conradi|John F. Brungot|Toralv Maurstad|Anders Bye|Jakob Oftebro|Eli Anne Linnestad|Eilif Hellum Noraker|Ingrid Vollan|Fredrik Steen|Hugh Bonneville
title: Solan & Eri - Navidad en Flåklypa
